DialogueOption.Text: No! Don't! I get the story! I get it. What do you want?

Dialogue.Page: Those little creatures suffered the fate of my immense power.
Their foolish actions led them to my domain.
Tampering with the 4th dimension was not, is not, and will NEVER be a good idea.
You're lucky I'm keeping you alive.
I have a task for you.
You may have lots of questions, so I'd like to answer them first.
<color=purple>Then I'll make that knowledge go down the drain.</color>
Here's your task: There is a time paradox that will break the fabric of the universe at any moment.
For some reason, I feel as if I can trust you.
You must reset time back to a point. That will prevent the paradox.
Now walk forward. I'll fill you in on the details.
